prod_short_desc: Join StarScavenger on dangerous salvage missions!
prod_long_desc:
Join the Freemakers: Rowan, Kordi and Zander as they travel the stars in search of space junk. With modular wings, engines and blasters, StarScavenger can be rebuilt into various configurations, and features a foldout top section that reveals a mini scavenger vessel with salvage scoop with space for a minifigure and R0-GR (Roger), the siblings’ friendly Droid. This set includes 3 minifigures plus a Droid.
Includes 3 minifigures: Rowan, Kordi and Zander, plus R0-GR (Roger) the friendly Droid.
Features a configurable design with modular wings, engines and blasters, 2 spring-loaded shooters, foldout top section, and a mini scavenger vessel with salvage scoop and space for a minifigure and Droid.
Rebuild the modular model into a variety of configurations.
Front cockpit section can be separated for a speedy getaway.
Detach the shovel cart and set out on make-believe salvage missions.
Accessory elements include a buzz saw, wrench, cup and macrobinoculars.
Play out your own exciting adventures from the LEGO® Star Wars: The Freemaker Adventures TV series.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 8-14.
StarScavenger in closed mode measures over 3” high, 8” long and 8” wide, and over 1” high, 8” long and 9” wide in alternate configuration.
